import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Container,Row,Col,Alert}from'react-bootstrap';import{useAuth}from'../contexts/AuthContext';import axios from'axios';import BlogCard from'../components/BlogCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MyBlogs=()=>{const{user}=useAuth();// Ottieni i dati dell'utente loggato
const[blogs,setBlogs]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMyBlogs=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);console.log('User ID:',user._id);// Logga l'ID dell'utente loggato
const response=await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/blogs/my-blogs?author=${user._id}`);console.log('Response data:',response.data);// Logga la risposta del backend
setBlogs(response.data.blogs);}catch(err){console.error('Errore nella richiesta:',err);// Logga l'errore
setError('Errore nel caricamento dei tuoi blog');}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(user){fetchMyBlogs();}},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"I Miei Blog"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{variant:"danger",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Caricamento in corso..."}):blogs.length>0?blogs.map(blog=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{md:4,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogCard,{blog:blog,user:user})," "]},blog._id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Non hai ancora pubblicato nessun blog"})})]});};export default MyBlogs;
